name: Buggy Bunny
description:
Controls:

The game is played by using the mouse to control your character.

BE WARY OF WALLS

Caution LEVEL 3 IS CURRENTLY LAGGY in browser.
If you are experiencing issues please download the executable and run as administrator
Clear the top part of level 3 first if this issue persists

The evil mage raccoons have stolen your carrots and drove your mech to go out of control!

Get Them Back using your not so trusty mech, it has no breaks and the mages are hitting you with speed bullets that cause your mech to keep going faster without the ability to stop!
